metadata.title: CVE-2011-1805 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Bad cast in CSS in Google Chrome prior to 11.0.0.0 allowed a remoteattacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
